subject: Helena here
body:
If you have a telephone and can return calls for us we will help you generate up to three k a day.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-705-4513




Get back to me via Shipman2Shipman@computercareercenter.com if not lnterested





It may be that our whole purpose in life is simply to serve as a warning to others.
